snippet: In Ocean Grove, N.J., a Methodist seaside resort, hostile speeches about same-sex marriage mix with lunchtime get-togethers that bridge both sides.
abstract: Ocean Grove Journal; Methodist ministry that is the sole landowner in the unincorporated town of Ocean Grove, NJ, has begun holding dialogue sessions in an effort to address growing tensions between the Ocean Grove Camp Meeting Association and gay residents and tourists; battle began when the association rejected a request to use a town pavilion for a same-sex civil union.
lead_paragraph: In Ocean Grove, N.J., a Methodist seaside resort, hostile speeches about same-sex marriage mix with lunchtime get-togethers that bridge both sides.

headline.seo: In Ocean Grove, Methodist Stronghold, a Dialogue on Gay Rights
headline.main: In Methodist Stronghold, a Dialogue on Gay Rights
headline.print_headline: In Methodist Stronghold, a Dialogue on Gay Rights

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
